response.overview: Exit 13 explores the journey of an overnight bathroom attendant at a remote truck stop.  One night he witnesses something that he wasn't supposed to see...  Starring Jeffrey Buehl, Dan Pinto and Sal Mistretta. Written, produced, directed and edited by Booker T. Mattison. Produced by Carrie Specht. Director of Photography Cybel Martin.
response.title: Exit 13
